name: Sure Cuts A Lot Version 5 Project

screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .scut5 file in Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio 5
screenshot.caption: SCUT5 file open in Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio 5

description: Sure Cuts A Lot is a program that enables you to import artwork or create custom designs, then cut them out for use in the real world with electronic cutting machines. As you create a design with version 5 of Sure Cuts A Lot, you can save it as a project with the .scut5 file extension to preserve your progress.

Each version of Sure Cuts A Lot saves projects with a .scut file extension followed by a number indicating the version of Sure Cuts A Lot that created it. For example, version 4 of Sure Cuts A Lot creates a project with the .scut4 file extension ( .SCUT4 file).

images.alt: Screenshot of a .scut5 file in Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio 5
images.caption: SCUT5 file open in Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio 5
